title: Azerbaijani envoy lauds PAF professionalism, rising indigenous capacity in aviation industry
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 9 (APP):Ambassador of Azerbaijan Khazar Farhadov Thursday called on Chief of the Air Staff, Pakistan Air Force (PAF) Air Chief Marshal Zaheer Ahmed Baber Sidhu and commended the professionalism of PAF and acknowledged its rising indigenous capacity in aviation industry.
During the meeting, both the dignitaries discussed matters of professional and mutual interest, said a PAF news release.
Speaking on the occasion, the Air Chief said Pakistan and Azerbaijan had longstanding religious, cultural and historical bonds which were manifested through strong ties between the Air Forces of two countries.
The Air Chief highlighted that both the countries enjoyed cordial relations and reiterated his resolve to further enhance the existing bilateral cooperation between the two brotherly countries.
